references.reason: This paper introduces DreamFusion, a seminal work in text-to-3D generation that uses 2D diffusion models as a foundation, directly influencing the current work's approach.

references.paper_title: Deep marching tetrahedra: a hybrid representation for high-resolution 3d shape synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes Deep Marching Tetrahedra, a 3D representation method used in the refinement process of the current work, optimizing the geometry for higher resolution.
The current work uses Magic3D as a baseline method for comparison, highlighting the improvements in generating self-supporting 3D models.

references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: NeRF, a neural radiance field representation, is referenced as it is relevant to the 3D representations used in text-to-3D generation, contributing to the field's evolution.

references.paper_title: Physical simulation layer for accurate 3d modeling
references.reason: This work explores physics-based approaches in 3D modeling, providing background for the physically constrained generation techniques employed in the current paper.
